price: Yaa Muusaa! Dubbiin Ani Allaah injifataa, ogeessa ta’eedha.
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
